Docs.param: The local user whose stats to access
The name of the statistic to get the leaderboard of
The query parameters of the leaderboard request
Docs.summary: Starts a request for a global leaderboard. You can retrieve the resulting data by checking the events returned from do_work for an event of type get_leaderboard_complete
Docs.return: Whether or not the leaderboard request was started correctly

MemberSignature.Value: public void RequestFlushToService (Microsoft.Xbox.Services.System.XboxLiveUser user);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RequestFlushToService([in]class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.System.XboxLiveUser user) runtime managed

Docs.param: The user to flush the stat for
Docs.summary: Force the current stat values to be uploaded to the service This will send immediately instead of automatically during a 30 second window
Docs.remarks: This can be throttled if called too often

Value to replace the stat by
